text:
Henry Charles "Hank" Stackpole III (May 7, 1935 – May 29, 2020) was an American lieutenant general in the Marine Corps. His awards include the Silver Star, Legion of Merit, and Defense Superior Service Medal. He entered the Marine Corps in 1957. He was born in New Haven, Connecticut.
Stackpole died in Hawaii on May 29, 2020 at the age of 85.
